meta.title: GIF Animation inÂ WPF
meta.excerpt: GIF images cannot be used directly in a WPF application. There are lot of third party libraries which support GIF images in WPF. Here is one which could play animated sprite sheets in WPF. [Read more]

content: GIF images cannot be used directly in a WPF application. There are lot of third party libraries which support GIF images in WPF. Here is one which could play animated sprite sheets in WPF. [Read more]
